summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Admin Categories hierarchical editor UI (P79). All 5 requested features verified successfully: Categories page loads and 'Yeni Kategori' modal opens, hierarchical Level 0/1/2 editor works with 'Onayla' and 'Altını Doldur' flow, Leaf marking changes badge and disables branch expansion, Level Navigator with root/breadcrumb/back/next buttons functional, Vasıta module panel with API/JSON/Excel import toggles visible.

issues: Minor: 'Altını Doldur' button remains visible but should be hidden/removed when leaf is marked (currently appears grayed out)

seed_data_creation: None required - used existing Emlak hierarchy for verification
context_for_next_testing_agent: P79 hierarchical category editor fully functional. Key data-testids: categories-create-open, categories-level-builder, categories-level-column-*, categories-level-item-*, categories-level-nav-*, categories-vehicle-master-panel, categories-vehicle-import-*. Level Navigator shows breadcrumb path (Level 0 Modül → Level 1: Name). Leaf marking changes badge from 'Dal Açık' to 'Leaf'.

verified: Modal panel visible with wizard steps
Level 0 (Modül) shows root category form with name/slug/country/module
Level 1 column appears with category items
Each item has: name, slug, sort order, Aktif checkbox, leaf checkbox
Level 2 column appears with 'Kategori Ekle' button
'Altını Doldur' button appears disabled when leaf is checked
Breadcrumb path shows 'Level 1: Otomobil' after selection
When module=vehicle selected, amber panel appears
Level suggestion text: 'Level 1 (Araç Tipi) → Level 2 (Model Yılı) → ... → Level 8 (Alt Model/Detay)'
'API'den Yükle' opens API panel with JSON payload textarea
'JSON Yükle' opens file upload panel with Choose File button
'Excel Yükle' opens same file upload panel
Dry-run checkbox available for both import methods
